title: dalle3: Ruined post-apocalyptic city
original_prompt: Photo of an ancient ruined city from a bird's-eye view, showing aged and worn-out skyscrapers, overgrown vegetation, and damaged streets. The ground should not have any white lines. The sky is filled with dark clouds, and birds can be seen flying overhead.
input1: Aerial view of a long-abandoned metropolis, where crumbling skyscrapers are entwined with thick vines and wild trees, their glass facades shattered. The streets below are cracked and uneven, devoid of any road markings. Ominous dark clouds loom overhead, casting shadows on the desolate landscape, while a flock of crows soars through the turbulent sky.
input2: Bird's-eye perspective of a forgotten urban landscape, featuring towering, dilapidated buildings covered in moss and ivy, with remnants of a once-bustling city now silent. The asphalt roads are broken and littered with debris, completely lacking any white lines. Above, a stormy sky swirls with dark clouds, and a group of seagulls can be seen gliding through the air, adding to the eerie atmosphere.
input1_ans:
The aerial view captures the haunting beauty of a long-abandoned metropolis, where nature has begun to reclaim its territory. Crumbling skyscrapers, once symbols of human achievement, now stand as mere skeletons, their glass facades shattered and covered in thick vines and wild trees. The streets below are a patchwork of cracked and uneven pavement, devoid of any road markings, emphasizing the desolation of the scene.

Ominous dark clouds loom overhead, casting a foreboding shadow over the landscape, while a flock of crows soars through the turbulent sky, adding to the eerie atmosphere. The juxtaposition of nature's resilience against the remnants of human civilization creates a striking visual narrative of decay and rebirth.

The scene unfolds from a bird's-eye view, revealing a long-abandoned metropolis that tells a story of decay and nature's reclamation. The once-majestic skyscrapers, now crumbling and aged, stand as silent sentinels, their glass facades shattered and reflecting the remnants of a bygone era. Thick vines and wild trees have taken hold, entwining themselves around the structures, creating a striking contrast between the man-made and the natural world.

Below, the streets are a patchwork of cracked and uneven pavement, devoid of any road markings, emphasizing the neglect that has befallen this city. The absence of white lines adds to the sense of desolation, as if the very essence of urban life has been erased.

Above, ominous dark clouds loom, casting a foreboding shadow over the landscape. The turbulent sky adds to the atmosphere of abandonment, hinting at a storm that may soon break. Amidst this haunting scene, a flock of crows soars through the air, their silhouettes stark against the darkened backdrop, embodying the spirit of survival in a world reclaimed by nature.
input2_ans:
The scene captures a hauntingly beautiful bird's-eye view of a forgotten urban landscape. Towering skyscrapers, once symbols of human achievement, now stand in various states of decay, their surfaces cloaked in vibrant green moss and creeping ivy. The remnants of a bustling city are evident in the crumbling facades and shattered windows, yet an eerie silence envelops the area.

The asphalt roads, once bustling with life, are now cracked and broken, strewn with debris that tells the story of abandonment. The absence of white lines adds to the desolation, as nature begins to reclaim its territory. 

Above, the sky is a dramatic canvas of swirling dark clouds, hinting at an impending storm. A group of seagulls glides gracefully through the turbulent air, their presence a stark contrast to the stillness below. This juxtaposition of life and decay creates an atmosphere that is both haunting and mesmerizing, inviting contemplation on the passage of time and the resilience of nature.

From a bird's-eye view, the forgotten urban landscape unfolds like a haunting memory. Towering skyscrapers, once symbols of prosperity, now stand as aged and worn-out giants, their surfaces cloaked in a thick layer of moss and ivy. The remnants of a once-bustling city are evident in the crumbling facades and shattered windows, whispering tales of a vibrant past now silenced by time.

The streets below are a chaotic tapestry of broken asphalt, with cracks snaking through the surface and debris scattered haphazardly, a stark reminder of neglect. The absence of white lines only adds to the desolation, as if the city itself has forgotten the rules that once governed it.

Above this melancholic scene, dark clouds swirl ominously, casting a shadow over the ruins. The atmosphere is thick with an impending storm, enhancing the eerie silence that envelops the area. Amidst this somber backdrop, a group of seagulls glides gracefully through the air, their presence a fleeting reminder of life in a place that has long since been abandoned. The juxtaposition of nature reclaiming the urban space against the backdrop of a turbulent sky creates a striking and poignant image of decay and resilience.
